# 37th Golden Bell Awards

The 37th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第37屆金鐘獎) was held on October 4, 2002 at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by TTV.
